item.title: Foundry VTT System: Dark Heresy 2nd Edition
item.description: This is an unofficial system for playing Dark Heresy 2nd Edition on Foundry VTT. It offers extensive support for character sheets, compendium packs, and automated management to save you time and allow you to focus on role playing. The existing system listed on Foundry was character sheet only and thus this system was created to facilitate the automation features I desired. item.title: OBS Tally Lights using a Raspberry Pi
item.description: OBS Tally Lights using Raspberry Pi GitHub Source See them in action In our use case we wanted lights attached to a specific camera that might appear in multiple scenes. To accomplish this, this script tracks a OBS source by name even if it appears in multiple scenes. If the source is live the tally light is red. If the source is in preview the light is yellow. And if the source is not in use in either location the light is green.
